wordpressPost.content:
We have many opportunities to make our processes more sustainable and we are working hard on this; we are using energy more efficiently by using LED lighting, diffuse glass and CO2 emission recycling for example. This allows us to realise more production even while using less energy.

Cultivation also offers opportunities for sustainability: how about biological insect control or improved fertilizsrs? Improved quality also indirectly influences environmental impact: the vase life of flowers is extended. This means less need to replace them.

So, you see: we note opportunities for sustainability in various ways. And… LinFlowers makes use of all of these! Can you see other possibilities? If so, please contact us!
